channel.title: About the Business Stuff category
channel.description:
OGM is about being as open as possible, and open-sourcing as much as possible.
That said, it is also a place for people to make a living, so it needs some business models.
One early example is the notion of StoryThreaders, which we talked about [in this call](https://youtu.be/M2l43ol0so0). Who would like to be a test-pilot StoryThreader? How might we sell a StoryThreading gig?

item.title: About the Business Stuff category
item.dc:creator: Jerry
item.description:
OGM is about being as open as possible, and open-sourcing as much as possible.

That said, it is also a place for people to make a living, so it needs some business models.

One early example is the notion of StoryThreaders, which we talked about in this call. Who would like to be a test-pilot StoryThreader? How might we sell a StoryThreading gig?
